justification: Understands B’s win-now needs and that Clark (Out) is expendable alongside Jones; a TE1 plus ascending RB fits B’s TE weakness and injury aversion. Takes B’s perspective by framing Jones as the starter. But the rationale is very brief and calls Clark a “backup,” downplaying his Tier 1 value and B’s preference for dual-threat QBs. Some coherence issues for A (giving up TE2 with Walker doubtful and acquiring an injured QB despite needing wins).
